evidence.claim: The Virtual Nursing Academy emphasizes HIPAA compliance in its services, ensuring that data privacy and security are maintained according to healthcare law.
The company utilizes cloud services for data management and secure video conferencing, ensuring flexibility and scalability of their operations.
Virtual Nursing Academy offers training and resources for healthcare professionals, indicating adherence to EHR standards and integration practices.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of involvement with X12 transactions or API automation.
